_sText:
This map was originally named de_paintball, but that name was taken, so I had to compromise :/  Plus, it didn't really look like a paintball field anyways :).

This was my first released CSS map, and I think I did pretty well for just experimenting with the source engine.  It might be a little dark, but that adds to the atmosphere.

I hope you have fun playing this map as much as I had making it!
